difficulty.title: Why is Dragonslayer Armor so easy? : r/darksouls3 - Reddit

strategy.title: How To Beat Dragonslayer Armour in Dark Souls 3 - Game Voyagers
strategy.body: The Dragonslayer Armour is not an optional boss.He must be defeated to gain access to the Grand Archives. Strategies for Defeating Dragonslayer Armour.
